text:
- Create an SVG with a PNG image in it. 
- Load the SVG in the SVG Viewer 
- Replace the PNG image with a different image 
- Reload 
 
-> You will still see the old image
creator: digulla@hepe.com

text:
Squiggle (the Batik SVG Viewer) has an raster image cache. To force the viewer 
to reload any external resources, use SHIFT+Reload.
creator: tkormann@apache.org
